name: namesuffix
description: Name suffix. Notes: Jr, Sr, I, II,, 1, 2, etc

name: raddnumber
description: Residence House Number. Notes: Hyphenated numbers allowed

name: rhalfcode
description: Residence Fractional Address. Notes: Â½, 1/3, etc.

name: rpredirection
description: Residence Pre Street Direction. Notes: (e.g. the 'E' in 52 E Main St)

name: rpostdirection
description: Residence Post Street Direction. Notes: (e.g. the 'SW' in 1200 Pecan Blvd SW )

name: mailadd1
description: Mailing Address 1. Notes: Free Form address

name: mailadd2
description: Mailing Address 2. Notes: Free Form address

name: mailadd3
description: Mailing Address 3. Notes: Free Form address

name: mailadd4
description: Mailing Address 4. Notes: Free Form address

name: gender
description: Gender. Notes: M = Male, F = Female. Optional

name: enrollment
description: Political Party. Notes: DEM = Democratic, REP = Republican, CON = Conservative, WOR = Working Families, IND = Independence, GRE = Green, OTH = Other (requires entry in Otherparty), BLK = No party affiliation designated

name: otherparty
description: Name or Party if Voter Checks 'Other' on registration form. Notes: RTH = Rent is Too High, LBT = Libertarian, APP = Antiprohibition, FDM = Freedom Party, TXP = Taxpayers

name: prevcounty
description: Last county voted in (from registration form ).

name: regdate
description: Application Date. Notes: YYYYMMDD (date application was received or postmarked)

name: vrsource
description: Application Source. Notes: AGCY = Agency, CBOE = County Board of Elections, DMV = Department of Motor Vehicle, LOCALREG = Local Registrar, MAIL = Mail-in through USPS, SCHOOL = School

name: idrequired
description: Identification Required Flag. Notes: Y=Yes, N=No

name: idmet
description: Identification Verification Requirement Met Flag. Notes: Indicates verification requirements (SSN, Driver ID verified or other acceptable ID), Y=Yes, N=No

name: status
description: Voter Status Codes. Notes: A = Active, AM = Active Military, AF = Active Special Federal, AP = Active Special Presidential, AU = Active UOCAVA, I = Inactive, P = Purged, 17 = Prereg - 17 Year Olds

name: reasoncode
description: Status Reason Codes. Notes: ADJ-INCOMP = Adjudged Incompetent, DEATH = Death, DUPLICATE = Duplicate, FELON = Felon, MAIL-CHECK = Mail Check, MOVED = Moved out of County, NCOA = NCOA, NVRA = NVRA, RETURN-MAIL = Returned Mail, VOTER-REQ = Voter Request

name: voterhistory
description: Voter History. Notes: Last 5 years voting history separated by semicolons
